Infectious Wrath

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Dragonborn, Dragonborn Fury racial trait, any psionic class
Benefit: The first time you are bloodied in each encounter, each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 388.
